column.name: description
column.value: Pool is played on a table with six pockets along the rails, into which balls are deposited.

column.name: description
column.value: Ping-pong is a racket sport derived from tennis but distinguished by its playing surface being atop a stationary table, rather than the court on which players stand.

column.name: description
column.value: Table football is a table-top game that is loosely based on association football. The aim of the game is to move the ball into the opponent's goal by manipulating rods which have figures attached.

column.name: description
column.value: Races are held on a simulator.

column.name: description
column.value: Basketball is a team sport in which two teams of five players each, opposing one another on a rectangular court, compete with the primary objective of shooting a basketball.
